title: ssh: make UnexpectedMessageError members public
body:
UnexpectedMessageError members are not public

Without that can only judge to disregard on the type.

Handshake will file with this error if there are not auth methods available (ie, user
forgot to load key in agent), so expected 50, but got 1 (disconnected). I specifically
care about this one case, would still like visibility for other cases.

Suggest making member of UnexpectedMessageError public.
